title: MongoDb Insert Operation
description: Schema for insert operations against a MongoDb database.

operation.title: Insert Operation
operation.description: The driver method that was called to execute an insert.

count.title: Record Count
count.description: The number of documents that were inserted in this operation.

insertedIds.title: Inserted Document Ids
insertedIds.description: The Id's of the inserted document(s).

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The time the operation began in the format specified in RFC3339 Section 5.6.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The amount of time, in milliseconds, that the operation took to execute.

options.title: Options
options.description: Any additional options that were passed into the operation. May be null.

connectionPort.title: Connection Port
connectionPort.description: The TCP/IP port used to connect to the MongoDb server.

connectionHost.title: Connection Host
connectionHost.description: The host of the MongoDb server.

database.title: Database
database.description: The MongoDb database that was operated against.

collection.title: Collection
collection.description: The MongoDb collection that was operated against.
